omop_queries.question: How many patients are in the database?
omop_queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS patient_count FROM person;

omop_queries.question: What is the gender distribution of patients?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT gender_concept_id, concept_name, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM person p
JOIN concept c ON p.gender_concept_id = c.concept_id
GROUP BY gender_concept_id, concept_name
ORDER BY count DESC;

omop_queries.question: How many patients are older than 65?
How many patients have been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS diabetes_patient_count
FROM condition_occurrence co
JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
WHERE c.concept_id = 201826 -- Type 2 diabetes concept ID
  AND c.standard_concept = 'S';

omop_queries.question: How many unique drugs have been prescribed?
What are the top 10 most common conditions in the database?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT c.concept_name, COUNT(DISTINCT co.person_id) AS patient_count
FROM condition_occurrence co
JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
WHERE c.standard_concept = 'S'
GROUP BY c.concept_name
ORDER BY patient_count DESC
LIMIT 10;

omop_queries.question: What are the most common medications prescribed for hypertension?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT c_med.concept_name AS medication, COUNT(DISTINCT de.person_id) AS patient_count
FROM condition_occurrence co
JOIN concept c_cond ON co.condition_concept_id = c_cond.concept_id
JOIN drug_exposure de ON co.person_id = de.person_id
JOIN concept c_med ON de.drug_concept_id = c_med.concept_id
WHERE c_cond.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316866) -- Hypertension concept
  AND c_cond.standard_concept = 'S'
  AND c_med.standard_concept = 'S'
  AND de.drug_exposure_start_date >= co.condition_start_date
GROUP BY c_med.concept_name
ORDER BY patient_count DESC
LIMIT 10;

omop_queries.question: What procedures are commonly performed on patients with heart failure?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT c_proc.concept_name AS procedure_name, COUNT(*) AS procedure_count
FROM condition_occurrence co
JOIN concept c_cond ON co.condition_concept_id = c_cond.concept_id
JOIN procedure_occurrence po ON co.person_id = po.person_id
JOIN concept c_proc ON po.procedure_concept_id = c_proc.concept_id
WHERE c_cond.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316139) -- Heart failure concept
  AND c_cond.standard_concept = 'S'
  AND c_proc.standard_concept = 'S'
  AND po.procedure_date >= co.condition_start_date
GROUP BY c_proc.concept_name
ORDER BY procedure_count DESC
LIMIT 15;

omop_queries.question: What is the average length of stay for inpatient visits?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT c.concept_name AS visit_type,
       AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM (visit_end_datetime - visit_start_datetime))) AS avg_length_of_stay_days
FROM visit_occurrence v
JOIN concept c ON v.visit_concept_id = c.concept_id
WHERE visit_concept_id = 9201 -- Inpatient visit
  AND visit_end_datetime IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY c.concept_name;

omop_queries.question: What is the distribution of HbA1c values for diabetic patients?
omop_queries.sql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN value_as_number < 5.7 THEN 'Normal (<5.7%)'
    WHEN value_as_number BETWEEN 5.7 AND 6.4 THEN 'Prediabetes (5.7-6.4%)'
    WHEN value_as_number BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.9 THEN 'Controlled Diabetes (6.5-7.9%)'
    WHEN value_as_number BETWEEN 8.0 AND 9.9 THEN 'Uncontrolled Diabetes (8.0-9.9%)'
    ELSE 'Poorly Controlled Diabetes (≥10.0%)'
  END AS hba1c_category,
  COUNT(DISTINCT m.person_id) AS patient_count
FROM measurement m
JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
JOIN condition_occurrence co ON m.person_id = co.person_id
JOIN concept c_cond ON co.condition_concept_id = c_cond.concept_id
WHERE c.concept_id = 3004410 -- HbA1c concept ID
  AND c_cond.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id IN (201826, 4193704)) -- Type 2 diabetes concepts
  AND c_cond.standard_concept = 'S'
GROUP BY hba1c_category
ORDER BY
  CASE
    WHEN hba1c_category = 'Normal (<5.7%)' THEN 1
    WHEN hba1c_category = 'Prediabetes (5.7-6.4%)' THEN 2
    WHEN hba1c_category = 'Controlled Diabetes (6.5-7.9%)' THEN 3
    WHEN hba1c_category = 'Uncontrolled Diabetes (8.0-9.9%)' THEN 4
    ELSE 5
  END;

omop_queries.question: Identify patients with rheumatoid arthritis who switched biologics within a year of initial treatment
omop_queries.sql:
WITH first_biologic AS (
  SELECT
    co.person_id,
    MIN(de.drug_exposure_start_date) AS first_biologic_date
  FROM condition_occurrence co
  JOIN concept c_cond ON co.condition_concept_id = c_cond.concept_id
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON co.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c_drug ON de.drug_concept_id = c_drug.concept_id
  WHERE c_cond.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 80809) -- RA concept
    AND c_drug.concept_class_id = 'Biological'
    AND de.drug_exposure_start_date >= co.condition_start_date
  GROUP BY co.person_id
),
second_biologic AS (
  SELECT
    fb.person_id,
    MIN(de.drug_exposure_start_date) AS second_biologic_date,
    c_drug.concept_name AS second_biologic_name
  FROM first_biologic fb
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON fb.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c_drug ON de.drug_concept_id = c_drug.concept_id
  WHERE c_drug.concept_class_id = 'Biological'
    AND de.drug_concept_id NOT IN (
      SELECT de2.drug_concept_id
      FROM drug_exposure de2
      WHERE de2.person_id = fb.person_id
        AND de2.drug_exposure_start_date = fb.first_biologic_date
    )
    AND de.drug_exposure_start_date > fb.first_biologic_date
    AND de.drug_exposure_start_date <= fb.first_biologic_date + INTERVAL '1 year'
  GROUP BY fb.person_id, c_drug.concept_name
)
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT sb.person_id) AS switched_patients,
  sb.second_biologic_name,
  AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM (sb.second_biologic_date - fb.first_biologic_date))) AS avg_days_to_switch
FROM second_biologic sb
JOIN first_biologic fb ON sb.person_id = fb.person_id
GROUP BY sb.second_biologic_name
ORDER BY switched_patients DESC;

omop_queries.question: What is the risk of myocardial infarction within 30 days after pneumonia diagnosis?
omop_queries.sql:
WITH pneumonia_patients AS (
  SELECT
    co.person_id,
    co.condition_start_date AS pneumonia_date
  FROM condition_occurrence co
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 255848) -- Pneumonia concept
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
),
mi_events AS (
  SELECT
    pp.person_id,
    MIN(co.condition_start_date) AS mi_date
  FROM pneumonia_patients pp
  JOIN condition_occurrence co ON pp.person_id = co.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4329847) -- MI concept
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
    AND co.condition_start_date > pp.pneumonia_date
    AND co.condition_start_date <= pp.pneumonia_date + INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY pp.person_id
)
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT pp.person_id) AS pneumonia_patients,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mi.person_id) AS mi_within_30_days,
  ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT mi.person_id)::NUMERIC / COUNT(DISTINCT pp.person_id)::NUMERIC) * 100, 2) AS percentage
FROM pneumonia_patients pp
LEFT JOIN mi_events mi ON pp.person_id = mi.person_id;

omop_queries.question: Compare the effectiveness of ACE inhibitors vs ARBs for blood pressure control in hypertensive patients
omop_queries.sql:
WITH hypertension_patients AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    person_id,
    MIN(condition_start_date) AS first_diagnosis_date
  FROM condition_occurrence co
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316866) -- Hypertension concept
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY person_id
),
ace_patients AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    hp.person_id,
    MIN(de.drug_exposure_start_date) AS first_ace_date
  FROM hypertension_patients hp
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON hp.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON de.drug_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1340128) -- ACE inhibitors concept
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
    AND de.drug_exposure_start_date >= hp.first_diagnosis_date
  GROUP BY hp.person_id
),
arb_patients AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    hp.person_id,
    MIN(de.drug_exposure_start_date) AS first_arb_date
  FROM hypertension_patients hp
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON hp.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON de.drug_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1341927) -- ARB concept
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
    AND de.drug_exposure_start_date >= hp.first_diagnosis_date
  GROUP BY hp.person_id
),
ace_bp_after AS (
  SELECT
    ap.person_id,
    AVG(m.value_as_number) AS avg_systolic
  FROM ace_patients ap
  JOIN measurement m ON ap.person_id = m.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id = 3004249 -- Systolic BP concept
    AND m.measurement_date BETWEEN ap.first_ace_date + INTERVAL '90 days' AND ap.first_ace_date + INTERVAL '180 days'
  GROUP BY ap.person_id
),
arb_bp_after AS (
  SELECT
    arbp.person_id,
    AVG(m.value_as_number) AS avg_systolic
  FROM arb_patients arbp
  JOIN measurement m ON arbp.person_id = m.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id = 3004249 -- Systolic BP concept
    AND m.measurement_date BETWEEN arbp.first_arb_date + INTERVAL '90 days' AND arbp.first_arb_date + INTERVAL '180 days'
  GROUP BY arbp.person_id
)
SELECT
  'ACE Inhibitors' AS medication_class,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ace_bp_after.person_id) AS patient_count,
  ROUND(AVG(ace_bp_after.avg_systolic), 1) AS avg_systolic_bp,
  ROUND(STDDEV(ace_bp_after.avg_systolic), 1) AS stddev_systolic_bp,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ace_bp_after.avg_systolic < 140 THEN 1 END) AS controlled_bp_count,
  ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN ace_bp_after.avg_systolic < 140 THEN 1 END)::NUMERIC / COUNT(*)::NUMERIC) * 100, 1) AS percent_controlled
FROM ace_bp_after
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'ARBs' AS medication_class,
  COUNT(DISTINCT arb_bp_after.person_id) AS patient_count,
  ROUND(AVG(arb_bp_after.avg_systolic), 1) AS avg_systolic_bp,
  ROUND(STDDEV(arb_bp_after.avg_systolic), 1) AS stddev_systolic_bp,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN arb_bp_after.avg_systolic < 140 THEN 1 END) AS controlled_bp_count,
  ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN arb_bp_after.avg_systolic < 140 THEN 1 END)::NUMERIC / COUNT(*)::NUMERIC) * 100, 1) AS percent_controlled
FROM arb_bp_after
ORDER BY medication_class;

omop_queries.question: Identify risk factors associated with 30-day readmission for congestive heart failure patients
omop_queries.sql:
WITH heart_failure_admissions AS (
  SELECT
    p.person_id,
    vo.visit_occurrence_id,
    vo.visit_start_date,
    vo.visit_end_date,
    p.gender_concept_id,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM vo.visit_start_date) - p.year_of_birth AS age_at_visit,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.person_id ORDER BY vo.visit_start_date) AS visit_seq
  FROM person p
  JOIN visit_occurrence vo ON p.person_id = vo.person_id
  JOIN condition_occurrence co ON vo.visit_occurrence_id = co.visit_occurrence_id
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316139) -- Heart failure
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
    AND vo.visit_concept_id = 9201 -- Inpatient
),
readmissions AS (
  SELECT
    hfa1.person_id,
    hfa1.visit_occurrence_id,
    hfa1.visit_start_date AS index_date,
    hfa1.visit_end_date AS index_end_date,
    MIN(hfa2.visit_start_date) AS readmit_date,
    CASE WHEN MIN(hfa2.visit_start_date) IS NOT NULL AND 
              MIN(hfa2.visit_start_date) <= hfa1.visit_end_date + INTERVAL '30 days' 
         THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS readmitted_30d
  FROM heart_failure_admissions hfa1
  LEFT JOIN heart_failure_admissions hfa2 ON 
    hfa1.person_id = hfa2.person_id AND
    hfa1.visit_occurrence_id <> hfa2.visit_occurrence_id AND
    hfa2.visit_start_date > hfa1.visit_end_date AND
    hfa2.visit_start_date <= hfa1.visit_end_date + INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY hfa1.person_id, hfa1.visit_occurrence_id, hfa1.visit_start_date, hfa1.visit_end_date
),
comorbidities AS (
  SELECT
    r.person_id,
    r.visit_occurrence_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 318712) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS kidney_disease,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4329847) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS myocardial_infarction,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 201826) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diabetes,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 432923) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS copd,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316139) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS heart_failure
  FROM readmissions r
  JOIN condition_occurrence co ON r.person_id = co.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE co.condition_start_date <= r.index_end_date
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY r.person_id, r.visit_occurrence_id
),
medications AS (
  SELECT
    r.person_id,
    r.visit_occurrence_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1340128) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ace_inhibitors,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1319998) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS beta_blockers,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1307863) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diuretics,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 21600744) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS anticoagulants
  FROM readmissions r
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON r.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON de.drug_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE de.drug_exposure_start_date BETWEEN r.index_date - INTERVAL '90 days' AND r.index_end_date
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY r.person_id, r.visit_occurrence_id
),
procedures AS (
  SELECT
    r.person_id,
    r.visit_occurrence_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4283892) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cardiac_catheterization,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4296653) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS echocardiogram
  FROM readmissions r
  JOIN procedure_occurrence po ON r.person_id = po.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON po.procedure_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE po.procedure_date BETWEEN r.index_date AND r.index_end_date
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY r.person_id, r.visit_occurrence_id
),
labs AS (
  SELECT
    r.person_id,
    r.visit_occurrence_id,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3023314 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS bun,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3011597 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS potassium,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3027114 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS sodium,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3016723 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS creatinine,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3000963 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS hematocrit
  FROM readmissions r
  JOIN measurement m ON r.person_id = m.person_id
  WHERE m.measurement_date BETWEEN r.index_date AND r.index_end_date
  GROUP BY r.person_id, r.visit_occurrence_id
),
los AS (
  SELECT
    r.person_id,
    r.visit_occurrence_id,
    EXTRACT(DAY FROM (r.index_end_date - r.index_date)) AS length_of_stay
  FROM readmissions r
)
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total_chf_admissions,
  SUM(r.readmitted_30d) AS readmission_count,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(r.readmitted_30d) / COUNT(*), 1) AS readmission_rate,
  
  -- Demographics
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 THEN hfa.age_at_visit END), 1) AS readmitted_avg_age,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 THEN hfa.age_at_visit END), 1) AS non_readmitted_avg_age,
  
  -- Comorbidities
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 AND c.kidney_disease = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(r.readmitted_30d), 1) AS readmit_pct_kidney_disease,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 AND c.kidney_disease = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (COUNT(*) - SUM(r.readmitted_30d)), 1) AS non_readmit_pct_kidney_disease,
  
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 AND c.diabetes = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(r.readmitted_30d), 1) AS readmit_pct_diabetes,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 AND c.diabetes = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (COUNT(*) - SUM(r.readmitted_30d)), 1) AS non_readmit_pct_diabetes,
  
  -- Medications
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 AND m.beta_blockers = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(r.readmitted_30d), 1) AS readmit_pct_beta_blockers,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 AND m.beta_blockers = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (COUNT(*) - SUM(r.readmitted_30d)), 1) AS non_readmit_pct_beta_blockers,
  
  -- Length of stay
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 THEN los.length_of_stay END), 1) AS readmitted_avg_los,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 THEN los.length_of_stay END), 1) AS non_readmitted_avg_los,
  
  -- Lab results
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 THEN l.creatinine END), 2) AS readmitted_avg_creatinine,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 THEN l.creatinine END), 2) AS non_readmitted_avg_creatinine,
  
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 1 THEN l.sodium END), 1) AS readmitted_avg_sodium,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN r.readmitted_30d = 0 THEN l.sodium END), 1) AS non_readmitted_avg_sodium
  
FROM readmissions r
JOIN heart_failure_admissions hfa ON r.visit_occurrence_id = hfa.visit_occurrence_id
LEFT JOIN comorbidities c ON r.visit_occurrence_id = c.visit_occurrence_id
LEFT JOIN medications m ON r.visit_occurrence_id = m.visit_occurrence_id
LEFT JOIN procedures p ON r.visit_occurrence_id = p.visit_occurrence_id
LEFT JOIN labs l ON r.visit_occurrence_id = l.visit_occurrence_id
LEFT JOIN los ON r.visit_occurrence_id = los.visit_occurrence_id;

omop_queries.question: Create a clinical profile of patients with both hypertension and chronic kidney disease, including medications, labs, and outcomes
omop_queries.sql:
WITH target_cohort AS (
  SELECT
    p.person_id,
    MIN(co_htn.condition_start_date) AS first_htn_date,
    MIN(co_ckd.condition_start_date) AS first_ckd_date,
    GREATEST(MIN(co_htn.condition_start_date), MIN(co_ckd.condition_start_date)) AS index_date,
    p.gender_concept_id,
    p.race_concept_id,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM GREATEST(MIN(co_htn.condition_start_date), MIN(co_ckd.condition_start_date))) - p.year_of_birth AS age_at_index
  FROM person p
  -- Get hypertension diagnoses
  JOIN condition_occurrence co_htn ON p.person_id = co_htn.person_id
  JOIN concept c_htn ON co_htn.condition_concept_id = c_htn.concept_id
  -- Get CKD diagnoses
  JOIN condition_occurrence co_ckd ON p.person_id = co_ckd.person_id
  JOIN concept c_ckd ON co_ckd.condition_concept_id = c_ckd.concept_id
  WHERE c_htn.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 316866) -- Hypertension
    AND c_ckd.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 46271022) -- CKD
    AND c_htn.standard_concept = 'S'
    AND c_ckd.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY p.person_id, p.gender_concept_id, p.race_concept_id, p.year_of_birth
),
demographics AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    c_gender.concept_name AS gender,
    c_race.concept_name AS race,
    tc.age_at_index,
    CASE 
      WHEN tc.age_at_index < 18 THEN '<18'
      WHEN tc.age_at_index BETWEEN 18 AND 44 THEN '18-44'
      WHEN tc.age_at_index BETWEEN 45 AND 64 THEN '45-64'
      WHEN tc.age_at_index BETWEEN 65 AND 74 THEN '65-74'
      ELSE '75+' 
    END AS age_group
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN concept c_gender ON tc.gender_concept_id = c_gender.concept_id
  JOIN concept c_race ON tc.race_concept_id = c_race.concept_id
),
comorbidities AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 201826) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diabetes,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 432867) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cardiovascular_disease,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 432923) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS copd,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4030518) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS depression,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4182210) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS anemia
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN condition_occurrence co ON tc.person_id = co.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE co.condition_start_date BETWEEN tc.index_date - INTERVAL '1 year' AND tc.index_date + INTERVAL '1 year'
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
),
medications AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1340128) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ace_inhibitors,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1341927) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS arbs,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1319998) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS beta_blockers,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1307863) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diuretics,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1332418) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS calcium_channel_blockers,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 939359) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS statins,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 1363749) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS phosphate_binders
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN drug_exposure de ON tc.person_id = de.person_id
  JOIN concept c ON de.drug_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE de.drug_exposure_start_date >= tc.index_date
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
),
lab_values AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    -- Kidney function
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3016723 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_creatinine,
    MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3016723 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS min_creatinine,
    MAX(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3016723 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS max_creatinine,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_egfr,
    MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS min_egfr,
    -- Blood pressure
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3004249 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_systolic,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3012888 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_diastolic,
    -- Urinary markers
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3000034 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_uacr,
    -- Electrolytes
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3023314 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_bun,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3023103 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_albumin,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3024561 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_phosphate,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3027114 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_sodium,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3011597 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_potassium,
    -- Anemia markers
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3000963 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_hematocrit,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3004501 THEN m.value_as_number END) AS avg_hemoglobin
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN measurement m ON tc.person_id = m.person_id
  WHERE m.measurement_date >= tc.index_date
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
),
outcomes AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    -- Kidney outcomes
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4069159) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dialysis,
    -- Cardiovascular outcomes
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 4329847) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS myocardial_infarction,
    MAX(CASE WHEN c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 372924) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS stroke,
    -- Mortality
    MAX(CASE WHEN d.person_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS death,
    -- Hospitalizations
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN vo.visit_concept_id = 9201 THEN vo.visit_occurrence_id END) AS inpatient_visits,
    -- ED visits
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN vo.visit_concept_id = 9203 THEN vo.visit_occurrence_id END) AS ed_visits
  FROM target_cohort tc
  LEFT JOIN procedure_occurrence po ON tc.person_id = po.person_id AND po.procedure_date >= tc.index_date
  LEFT JOIN concept c_proc ON po.procedure_concept_id = c_proc.concept_id
  LEFT JOIN condition_occurrence co ON tc.person_id = co.person_id AND co.condition_start_date >= tc.index_date
  LEFT JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  LEFT JOIN death d ON tc.person_id = d.person_id
  LEFT JOIN visit_occurrence vo ON tc.person_id = vo.person_id AND vo.visit_start_date >= tc.index_date
  WHERE (c.concept_id IS NULL OR c.standard_concept = 'S')
    AND (c_proc.concept_id IS NULL OR c_proc.standard_concept = 'S')
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
),
ckd_staging AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    CASE
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) >= 90 THEN 'Stage 1'
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) BETWEEN 60 AND 89 THEN 'Stage 2'
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) BETWEEN 45 AND 59 THEN 'Stage 3A'
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) BETWEEN 30 AND 44 THEN 'Stage 3B'
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) BETWEEN 15 AND 29 THEN 'Stage 4'
      WHEN MIN(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 THEN m.value_as_number END) < 15 THEN 'Stage 5'
      ELSE 'Unknown'
    END AS ckd_stage
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN measurement m ON tc.person_id = m.person_id
  WHERE m.measurement_concept_id = 3049187 -- eGFR
    AND m.measurement_date >= tc.index_date
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
),
bp_control AS (
  SELECT
    tc.person_id,
    CASE
      WHEN AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3004249 THEN m.value_as_number END) < 130 AND
           AVG(CASE WHEN m.measurement_concept_id = 3012888 THEN m.value_as_number END) < 80 THEN 'Controlled'
      ELSE 'Uncontrolled'
    END AS bp_control_status
  FROM target_cohort tc
  JOIN measurement m ON tc.person_id = m.person_id
  WHERE (m.measurement_concept_id = 3004249 OR m.measurement_concept_id = 3012888)
    AND m.measurement_date >= tc.index_date
  GROUP BY tc.person_id
)
SELECT
  -- Cohort size
  COUNT(DISTINCT tc.person_id) AS total_patients,
  
  -- Demographics
  ROUND(AVG(tc.age_at_index), 1) AS avg_age,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.gender = 'MALE' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_male,
  
  -- Age distribution
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.age_group = '<18' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_under_18,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.age_group = '18-44' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_18_44,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.age_group = '45-64' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_45_64,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.age_group = '65-74' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_65_74,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN d.age_group = '75+' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_75_plus,
  
  -- Comorbidities
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(cm.diabetes) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_diabetes,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(cm.cardiovascular_disease) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_cvd,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(cm.anemia) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_anemia,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(cm.depression) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_depression,
  
  -- CKD Staging
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 1' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_1,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 2' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_2,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 3A' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_3a,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 3B' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_3b,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 4' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_4,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN cs.ckd_stage = 'Stage 5' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stage_5,
  
  -- BP Control
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN bpc.bp_control_status = 'Controlled' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_bp_controlled,
  
  -- Medications
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.ace_inhibitors) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_acei,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.arbs) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_arbs,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.beta_blockers) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_beta_blockers,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.calcium_channel_blockers) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_ccb,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.diuretics) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_diuretics,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.statins) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_statins,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(m.phosphate_binders) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_on_phosphate_binders,
  
  -- Lab values (average)
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_egfr), 1) AS avg_egfr_value,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_creatinine), 2) AS avg_creatinine_value,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_uacr), 1) AS avg_uacr_value,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_systolic), 1) AS avg_systolic_bp,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_diastolic), 1) AS avg_diastolic_bp,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_hemoglobin), 1) AS avg_hemoglobin_value,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_phosphate), 2) AS avg_phosphate_value,
  ROUND(AVG(lv.avg_potassium), 2) AS avg_potassium_value,
  
  -- Outcomes
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(o.dialysis) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_dialysis,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(o.myocardial_infarction) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_mi,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(o.stroke) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_stroke,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(o.death) / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_death,
  ROUND(AVG(o.inpatient_visits), 2) AS avg_hospitalizations_per_patient,
  ROUND(AVG(o.ed_visits), 2) AS avg_ed_visits_per_patient
  
FROM target_cohort tc
JOIN demographics d ON tc.person_id = d.person_id
LEFT JOIN comorbidities cm ON tc.person_id = cm.person_id
LEFT JOIN medications m ON tc.person_id = m.person_id
LEFT JOIN lab_values lv ON tc.person_id = lv.person_id
LEFT JOIN outcomes o ON tc.person_id = o.person_id
LEFT JOIN ckd_staging cs ON tc.person_id = cs.person_id
LEFT JOIN bp_control bpc ON tc.person_id = bpc.person_id;

omop_queries.question: Implement the ASCVD (Atherosclerotic Cardiovascular Disease) risk score calculation using OMOP data
omop_queries.sql:
WITH patient_cohort AS (
  SELECT
    p.person_id,
    p.gender_concept_id,
    c_gender.concept_name AS gender,
    p.race_concept_id,
    c_race.concept_name AS race,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) - p.year_of_birth AS age,
    CASE WHEN p.gender_concept_id = 8507 THEN 'Male' ELSE 'Female' END AS sex,
    CASE 
      WHEN c_race.concept_name LIKE '%Black%' OR c_race.concept_name LIKE '%African American%' THEN 'Black'
      ELSE 'Other'
    END AS race_group
  FROM person p
  JOIN concept c_gender ON p.gender_concept_id = c_gender.concept_id
  JOIN concept c_race ON p.race_concept_id = c_race.concept_id
  WHERE (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) - p.year_of_birth) BETWEEN 40 AND 79
),
total_cholesterol AS (
  SELECT
    m.person_id,
    AVG(m.value_as_number) AS total_cholesterol_avg
  FROM measurement m
  JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id = 3027114 -- Total Cholesterol
    AND m.value_as_number > 0
    AND m.value_as_number < 600
  GROUP BY m.person_id
),
hdl_cholesterol AS (
  SELECT
    m.person_id,
    AVG(m.value_as_number) AS hdl_avg
  FROM measurement m
  JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id = 3027114 -- HDL
    AND m.value_as_number > 0
    AND m.value_as_number < 200
  GROUP BY m.person_id
),
systolic_bp AS (
  SELECT
    m.person_id,
    AVG(m.value_as_number) AS systolic_avg,
    AVG(CASE WHEN de.person_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS on_bp_meds
  FROM measurement m
  JOIN concept c ON m.measurement_concept_id = c.concept_id
  LEFT JOIN drug_exposure de ON m.person_id = de.person_id
  LEFT JOIN concept c_drug ON de.drug_concept_id = c_drug.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id = 3004249 -- Systolic BP
    AND m.value_as_number > 60
    AND m.value_as_number < 240
    AND (c_drug.concept_id IS NULL OR 
        c_drug.concept_id IN (
          SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor 
          WHERE ancestor_concept_id IN (1340128, 1341927, 1319998, 1307863, 1332418)
        )) -- Common BP med classes (ACEi, ARB, BB, diuretics, CCB)
    AND (de.drug_exposure_start_date IS NULL OR de.drug_exposure_start_date <= m.measurement_date)
  GROUP BY m.person_id
),
diabetes AS (
  SELECT
    co.person_id,
    1 AS has_diabetes
  FROM condition_occurrence co
  JOIN concept c ON co.condition_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (SELECT descendant_concept_id FROM concept_ancestor WHERE ancestor_concept_id = 201826) -- Diabetes
    AND c.standard_concept = 'S'
  GROUP BY co.person_id
),
smoking AS (
  SELECT
    o.person_id,
    MAX(CASE 
      WHEN c.concept_id IN (4261564, 42709996, 45765920) THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END) AS is_current_smoker
  FROM observation o
  JOIN concept c ON o.observation_concept_id = c.concept_id
  WHERE c.concept_id IN (
    4261564, -- Current tobacco smoker
    42709996, -- Current every day smoker
    45765920, -- Tobacco use
    4031965, -- Non-smoker
    4294542 -- Former smoker
  )
  GROUP BY o.person_id
),
ascvd_input AS (
  SELECT
    pc.person_id,
    pc.age,
    pc.sex,
    pc.race_group,
    tc.total_cholesterol_avg,
    hdl.hdl_avg,
    sbp.systolic_avg,
    COALESCE(sbp.on_bp_meds, 0) AS on_bp_meds,
    COALESCE(d.has_diabetes, 0) AS has_diabetes,
    COALESCE(s.is_current_smoker, 0) AS is_current_smoker
  FROM patient_cohort pc
  LEFT JOIN total_cholesterol tc ON pc.person_id = tc.person_id
  LEFT JOIN hdl_cholesterol hdl ON pc.person_id = hdl.person_id
  LEFT JOIN systolic_bp sbp ON pc.person_id = sbp.person_id
  LEFT JOIN diabetes d ON pc.person_id = d.person_id
  LEFT JOIN smoking s ON pc.person_id = s.person_id
  WHERE tc.total_cholesterol_avg IS NOT NULL
    AND hdl.hdl_avg IS NOT NULL
    AND sbp.systolic_avg IS NOT NULL
    AND s.is_current_smoker IS NOT NULL
),
ascvd_calculation AS (
  SELECT
    ai.person_id,
    ai.age,
    ai.sex,
    ai.race_group,
    ai.total_cholesterol_avg,
    ai.hdl_avg,
    ai.systolic_avg,
    ai.on_bp_meds,
    ai.has_diabetes,
    ai.is_current_smoker,
    -- Coefficient calculation based on 2013 ACC/AHA Guideline on the Assessment of Cardiovascular Risk
    CASE
      WHEN ai.sex = 'Female' AND ai.race_group = 'Black' THEN
        17.114 * LN(ai.age) +
        0.940 * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        18.920 * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        0.818 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * (1 - ai.on_bp_meds) +
        0.296 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * ai.on_bp_meds +
        0.874 * ai.is_current_smoker +
        0.463 * ai.has_diabetes - 86.61
        
      WHEN ai.sex = 'Female' AND ai.race_group = 'Other' THEN
        -29.799 * LN(ai.age) +
        4.884 * LN(ai.age) * LN(ai.age) +
        13.540 * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        3.114 * LN(ai.age) * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        13.578 * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        3.149 * LN(ai.age) * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        1.957 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * (1 - ai.on_bp_meds) +
        1.082 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * ai.on_bp_meds +
        7.574 * ai.is_current_smoker -
        1.665 * LN(ai.age) * ai.is_current_smoker +
        0.661 * ai.has_diabetes - 29.18
        
      WHEN ai.sex = 'Male' AND ai.race_group = 'Black' THEN
        2.469 * LN(ai.age) +
        0.302 * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        0.307 * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        1.916 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * (1 - ai.on_bp_meds) +
        1.809 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * ai.on_bp_meds +
        0.549 * ai.is_current_smoker +
        0.645 * ai.has_diabetes - 19.54
        
      WHEN ai.sex = 'Male' AND ai.race_group = 'Other' THEN
        12.344 * LN(ai.age) +
        11.853 * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        2.664 * LN(ai.age) * LN(ai.total_cholesterol_avg) -
        7.990 * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        1.769 * LN(ai.age) * LN(ai.hdl_avg) +
        1.797 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * (1 - ai.on_bp_meds) +
        1.764 * LN(ai.systolic_avg) * ai.on_bp_meds +
        7.837 * ai.is_current_smoker -
        1.795 * LN(ai.age) * ai.is_current_smoker +
        0.658 * ai.has_diabetes - 61.18
    END AS coefficient
  FROM ascvd_input ai
),
ascvd_risk AS (
  SELECT
    ac.*,
    CASE
      WHEN ac.sex = 'Female' AND ac.race_group = 'Black' THEN
        1 - POWER(0.9533, EXP(ac.coefficient))
      WHEN ac.sex = 'Female' AND ac.race_group = 'Other' THEN
        1 - POWER(0.9665, EXP(ac.coefficient))
      WHEN ac.sex = 'Male' AND ac.race_group = 'Black' THEN
        1 - POWER(0.8954, EXP(ac.coefficient))
      WHEN ac.sex = 'Male' AND ac.race_group = 'Other' THEN
        1 - POWER(0.9144, EXP(ac.coefficient))
    END * 100 AS ascvd_10yr_risk,
    CASE
      WHEN ac.age >= 40 AND ac.age <= 59 THEN 'Group 1: 40-59'
      WHEN ac.age >= 60 AND ac.age <= 79 THEN 'Group 2: 60-79'
    END AS age_group
  FROM ascvd_calculation ac
)
SELECT
  ar.person_id,
  ar.age,
  ar.sex,
  ar.race_group,
  ROUND(ar.total_cholesterol_avg, 0) AS total_cholesterol,
  ROUND(ar.hdl_avg, 0) AS hdl,
  ROUND(ar.systolic_avg, 0) AS systolic_bp,
  CASE WHEN ar.on_bp_meds > 0 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS on_bp_meds,
  CASE WHEN ar.has_diabetes = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS has_diabetes,
  CASE WHEN ar.is_current_smoker = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS is_current_smoker,
  ROUND(ar.ascvd_10yr_risk, 1) AS ascvd_10yr_risk_pct,
  CASE
    WHEN ar.ascvd_10yr_risk < 5 THEN 'Low Risk (<5%)'
    WHEN ar.ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 5 AND 7.4 THEN 'Borderline Risk (5-7.4%)'
    WHEN ar.ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 7.5 AND 19.9 THEN 'Intermediate Risk (7.5-19.9%)'
    ELSE 'High Risk (≥20%)'
  END AS risk_category
FROM ascvd_risk ar
ORDER BY ar.ascvd_10yr_risk DESC;

-- Summary statistics
SELECT
  'All Patients' AS group_name,
  COUNT(*) AS patient_count,
  ROUND(AVG(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS avg_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(STDDEV(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS stddev_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(MIN(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS min_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(MAX(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS max_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk < 5 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_low_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 5 AND 7.4 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_borderline_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 7.5 AND 19.9 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_intermediate_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk >= 20 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_high_risk
FROM ascvd_risk

UNION ALL

SELECT
  sex || '-' || race_group || ' ' || age_group AS group_name,
  COUNT(*) AS patient_count,
  ROUND(AVG(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS avg_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(STDDEV(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS stddev_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(MIN(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS min_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(MAX(ascvd_10yr_risk), 1) AS max_10yr_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk < 5 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_low_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 5 AND 7.4 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_borderline_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk BETWEEN 7.5 AND 19.9 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_intermediate_risk,
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ascvd_10yr_risk >= 20 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) AS pct_high_risk
FROM ascvd_risk
GROUP BY sex, race_group, age_group
ORDER BY group_name;
